TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract FormDescription

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

span.para: 表示 Outlook 窗体的常规属性。
在设计时显示窗体的属性页上的 Outlook 窗体属性。
若要查看在设计时的属性页上，打开 Outlook 项目、 工具菜单上选择窗体、 单击设计该窗体，，然后单击在项目的窗口中的属性选项卡。
使用属性可返回与 Outlook 项目相关的FormDescription对象。
Represents the general properties of an Outlook form.
The properties of an Outlook form are displayed on the Properties page of a form in design time.
To see the Properties page in design time, open the Outlook item, select Forms on the Tools menu, click Design This Form, and then click the Properties tab in the item's window.
Use the property to return the FormDescription object associated with an Outlook item.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回表示 Outlook application 对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent Outlook application for the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContactName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的联系人的信息自定义窗体，此名称对象。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the name of the person to contact for information regarding the custom form for this object.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的窗体，在选择窗体对话框中显示的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the name of the form, which is displayed in the Choose Forms dialog box.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 如果两个和FormDescription.DisplayName属性为空，设置一个会将其他设置。如果已以前设置，其他设置不会更改值。
If both the and FormDescription.DisplayName properties are empty, setting one will set the other. If one has been previously set, setting the other will not change the value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Hidden { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值，该值指示True以使指定的自定义窗体，为隐藏。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) value that indicates True to cause the specified custom form to be hidden.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 自定义窗体不会显示在菜单上，或在选择窗体对话框，并将被指定为另一个自定义窗体中的响应窗体时，才使用。默认值为False。
The custom form will not appear on the menu or in the Choose Form dialog box and will be used only if it is designated as the response form from another custom form. The default value is False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Icon { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示窗体显示的图标的文件名。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the file name of the icon to be displayed for the form.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Locked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值，该值指示True ，如果不能修改窗体。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) value that indicates True if the form cannot be modified.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageClass As String
public: property System::String ^ MessageClass { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的邮件类对象。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the message class for the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性对应于 MAPI 属性PidTagMessageClass。MessageClass属性链接到窗体所基于的项目。选择项目时，Outlook 将使用的邮件类来定位窗体和公开其属性，如答复命令。

This property corresponds to the MAPI property PidTagMessageClass. The MessageClass property links the item to the form on which it is based. When an item is selected, Outlook uses the message class to locate the form and expose its properties, such as Reply commands.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MiniIcon { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值代表窗体的显示名称的字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) value that represents the display name for a form.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 名称也是窗体的标题。必须设置此属性，然后才能使用方法。
The Name is also the caption for a form. This property must be set before you can use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Number { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置对应于指定的窗体的号码的字符串（C# 中的字符串）。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) corresponding to the number for the specified form.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneOff { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值，该值指示True ，如果窗体将删除一次使用后 （一次性）， False如果窗体保留为自定义窗体。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) value that indicates True if the form will be discarded after using once (one-off), and False if the form is retained as a custom form.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PublishForm (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegistry Registry, object Folder);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PublishForm([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegistry Registry, [in]object Folder) runtime managed
Public Sub PublishForm (Registry As OlFormRegistry, Optional Folder As Object)

span.span: The form class.

param.name: Folder

span.span: Expression that returns a object.
Used only with Folder form registry.

param.span: 必须来访问窗体文件夹对象。

span.span: The folder object from which the forms must be accessed.

summary.span: 保存的定义指定的窗体注册表 （库） 中的对象。

span.span: Saves the definition of the object in the specified form registry (library).

span.para: 注释：属性必须设置在使用PublishForm方法之前。
窗体均注册为以下三类之一： 文件夹、 组织或个人。文件夹窗体注册表包含一组仅可访问该特定文件夹中的窗体是否公共或专用。组织窗体注册表包含整个企业内共享和所有人都可以访问窗体。个人窗体注册表拥有仅供当前用户存储的窗体。
Note: The property must be set before you can use the PublishForm method.

Forms are registered as one of three classes: Folder, Organization, or Personal. The Folder form registry holds a set of forms that are only accessible from that specific folder, whether public or private. The Organization form registry holds forms that are shared across an entire enterprise and are accessible to everyone. The Personal form registry holds forms that are accessible only to the current store user.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptText As String
public: property System::String ^ ScriptText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 包含所有 VBScript 代码窗体的脚本编辑器中。

span.para: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。这两个成员的作用相同。例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Template { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性是指 Microsoft Office Word。点模板文件，因此它是适用于窗体与 = ，则返回 True。
This property refers to a Microsoft Office Word .DOT template file, and so is applicable for forms with = True.

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates True to use Microsoft Office Word as the default editor for the form.

span.span: Read/write.
